categories: Category:Imperial Navy officers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Lieutenant Gar was an Imperial officer.

As lieutenant in the Empire, Gar served under Sil Sorannan within the ranks of the Black Sword Command. He was a prisoner who was held by the Yevetha at Camp Pa'aal on N'zoth after being captured by the invaders. Gar managed to escape Camp Pa'aal with Sorannan and recapture the Pride of Yevetha.
